text: Kane Stuart Williamson (born 8 August 1990) is a New Zealand international cricketer. He is currently the captain of the New Zealand national team in all formats. He is a right-handed batsman and an occasional off spin bowler. ==International centuries== , Williamson has scored 24 Test and 13 ODI centuries. His highest score in Test is 251 and 148 in ODIs. He is yet to score a century in T20Is. ==Achievements== In the annual ICC Awards in January 2022, Williamson was included in ICC Men's Test Team of the Year for the year 2021. ==Personal life== ===Donations=== During the New Zealand vs Pakistan 2014 ODI series, Williamson donated his entire match fee for all five ODIs to the victims of the 2014 Peshawar school massacre. He bowls and bats right handed but writes left handed. ===Family=== Williamson and his wife Sarah became parents when their daughter was born in 2020. He stood down from the second Test against the West Indies so he could attend the birth. ==References== ==Other websites== *Kane Williamson at Howstat |- |- Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Kane Williamson
